alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Montezuma and northwestern La Plata Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Mancos, or 13 miles northwest of Durango, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Plata and Mayday. This includes U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 64 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
